snippet.title: Hades trailer
snippet.description:
The Garden of Hades is a surreal point-and-click adventure in which you have to save the soul of a woman held by Hades, the ancient god of the dead.
You play in five very different settings - a little girl's dream, a young woman's psychedelic trip, a comic book journey into space, a pack of Tarot cards in a puppet theatre, and a detective story concerning a Chinese plate.
There are many challenges you must overcome before the final confrontation with Hades himself.  If you dare, step into The Garden of Hades!
